course_title: Topics: Hispanic Studies: Following the Thread
seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 15 / Seats Avail: 3Waitlist Total: 0
class_notes:
Description: Discussion of current events in the Spanish-speaking world. Includes written and and oral responses and analysis of Spanish-language news articles and podcasts.
Prerequisite: Spanish 212.
Priority given to Spanish, SpanPort and SpanLing majors and minors. Does not fill HAL or other general education requirements. Interested students may contact Prof. Katherine Ostrom at kostrom.emory.edu for more information
course_description: Intermediate-level studies of the language, discourse, literature, and/or culture of the Spanish-speaking world. May be taught in English or Spanish. Students may take multiple SPAN 285 courses provided that they focus on different topics.
sections: Class Nbr: 6071, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: F 11:30a-12:20p, Instructor: K. Ostrom, Status: Open
